comment: it is a nice laptop. it is very lite weight and easy to carry. i like the look of the laptop very much.
the battary backup of this laptop is very good. and also charge up pretty fast. i love it.
it is a very justified priced product. it is included in windows 11 home and also has 11th Gen Intel® Core™ i7 processor; Intel® Iris® Xe Graphics.
i love the slim designe. 17.3 diagonal FHD, IPS, WLED-backlit, multitouch-enabled, edge-to-edge glass (1920 x 1080) display. also has a HP Wide Vision 720p HD camera
it is one of the best product i ever used. it has a good audio system and Dual speakers
it has Fingerprint reader, Precision Touchpad Support, Supports battery fast charge: approximately 50% in 30 minutes
